subject: Native Americans
Lacrosse
Passports
Visas
United States International Relations
lead_paragraph: The lacrosse team, known as the Nationals, had been embroiled in a dispute with the British about using tribal passports instead of ones issued by the United States or Canada.
snippet: The lacrosse team, known as the Nationals, had been embroiled in a dispute with the British about using tribal passports instead of ones issued by the United States or Canada.
